title: Number of outbound trips from China to Europe in 2018 , by region of destination
summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Europe European Union, and Arrivals in millions in each Europe European Union on the y axis.
The maximum Arrivals in millions 5.93 is found at Europe European Union Central/Eastern Europe and the minimum is found at Southern/Mediterranean Europe where Europe European Union is 1.12.
The Arrivals in millions of Europe European Union Central/Eastern Europe is 5.29% larger than the minimum value at Southern/Mediterranean Europe.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Europe European Union in the x axis and Arrivals in millions in the y axis.
The maximum Arrivals in millions 5.93 is found at Europe European Union Central/Eastern Europe and the minimum is found at Southern/Mediterranean Europe where Europe European Union is 1.12.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Europe European Union, and Arrivals in millions in each Europe European Union on the y axis.
The maximum Arrivals in millions 5.93 is found at Europe European Union Central/Eastern Europe and the minimum is found at Southern/Mediterranean Europe where Europe European Union is 1.12.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Arrivals in millions for 4 number of Europe European Unions.
Europe European Union Central/Eastern Europe has the highest Arrivals in millions and Southern/Mediterranean Europe has the lowest Arrivals in millions.
The Arrivals in millions of Europe European Union Southern/Mediterranean Europe is 5.29% smaller than the maximum value at Central/Eastern Europe.
Arrivals in millions at Europe European Union Central/Eastern Europe is 5.93 , second place is Western Europe at 5.9, and thirdly is Northern Europe at 1.15.
Considered together, the average Arrivals in millions in all 4 Europe European Unions is roughly 3.53.
Summing up the values of all Europe European Unions, we get total 14.1.
